snippet: The authorities lied to Officer Gilberto Valle to get him to step out into the hallway of his apartment complex, and at least once while they were interrogating him, a federal agent testified.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation agent offers testimony in Federal District in Manhattan describing how FBI team prepared for arrest and interrogation of Gilberto Valle, former New York police officer accused of plotting to kidnap, kill and eat women; Valle faces charges that include kidnapping conspiracy, which carries a maximum sentence of life in prison.
lead_paragraph: The authorities lied to Officer Gilberto Valle to get him to step out into the hallway of his apartment complex, and at least once while they were interrogating him, a federal agent testified.

headline.seo: In Cannibal Case, F.B.I. Ruses Are Recounted
headline.main: Ruses Used by F.B.I. Are Recounted in Cannibal Case
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Ruses Recounted in Cannibal Case
